mapper.select: select no, depth, board_no, member_no, writer, content, reg_date, parent, fleg from(select * from home_reply where board_no = #{value}) start with parent=0 connect by prior no = parent order siblings by no
mapper.insert: insert into home_reply( no, board_no, member_no, writer, content, reg_date, parent, depth ) values( home_reply_seq.nextval, #{board_no}, #{member_no}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate, #{parent}, #{depth} )
